game.name: The House on the Hill
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: First-person horror exploration game! You've just moved to a new rural town and you've been tasked with babysitting the neighbor kid. Only, things in this town seem strange. Explore the world and solve the secrets of your neighborhood while still being a half-decent babysitter.
